nodes.title: Update ASM to 7.0 to support Java 11
Junit4-support for @ArchTest instance fields or static methods in abstract base classes
Use Maven Surefire 2.22.0 in example installation
Adds various methods to the rules API that allow only certain types of accesses / dependencies
Extend rules api with dependency conditions
Filter-out synthetic and bridge members (ctors, methods, fields)
Adds a reverse lookup of members that have a type depending on this class
Added Support for rules from PlantUML diagrams
Supports running on Java Early Access versions
Support condition to check how many classes have matched
Adds theClass(..), noClass(..), should().be(..) and should().notBe(..)
URLs should now be resolved in a platform independent way
@ArchIgnore annotation allows to specify a reason why the test is ignored
Add syntax fails on invalid args
draft proposal for new chapter in userguide
Add a paragraph to the README about using ArchUnit with JUnit 4 Categories
Add possibility for ignores to slices rules
@ArchIgnore should work correctly on ArchRules fields
add missing gradle task dependencies, enabling to run `./gradlew clean test'
added shell script to run various docker-compose options:
failing rules also show how often a rule was violated
Allows to import multiple Jars at once
Allow multiple import options and be more restrictive within ImportOption.DontIncludeTests
Allow usage of TestSets in Gradle
Prevent excessive logging when supplying system properties
Run integration tests for all JDKs in Github action for CI
add possibility to execute multi JDK multi OS tests
Make all tests green on JDK 14
add rule to prevent dependencies on upper packages
fix inconsistent behavior with respect to primitive array types
Fix onlyxxx that behaving inconsistently for unresolvable targets
fix tests not behaving consistently with Android
Use first line number from LineNumberTable for JavaCodeUnit's sourceCodeLocation
Remove API that was deprecated in v0.12.0
Reuse supplied import options in ClassFileImporter.importClasspath()
Reduce number of details shown for cycle violations
Extend MembersThat and MembersShould to have starting,… (Resolves #239)
Add support for records (Java 14 preview feature)
Fix version of Gradle in wrapper task
fix broken JRT URL handling for JDK >= 13
Official Gradle Wrapper Validation GitHub Action
reduce log levels of class import details
Add API methods to JavaPackage to read package-info.java
Add GeneralCodingRule to discourage use of field injection
Allow empty layers in LayeredArchitecture & OnionArchitecture when configured
make default ViolationLinerMatcher ignore numbers after a "$" (#248)
Added override method visitInvokeDynamicInsn to handle lambda expression method references
update ASM to 7.2, adding support for Java 14 (resolves #230)
Extend syntax to query different kinds of classes
Offer a way to retrieve the component type of a `JavaClass` that is an array
Handling of SYNTHETIC and BRIDGE modifiers added
Add the possibility to define a layer using a DescribedPredicate - Issue 228
Check that layered architecture does not contain empty layers - Issue #177
Drop filtering of self access from JavaAccessCondition
Clarify difference between nested and inner classes
Ensure correct simple name for local classes
add full name restrictions/assertions to members API
WIP introducing new method to receive a `CodeUnitParameterList` from a JavaCodeUnit
exclude spotbugs false positives to support build with JDK-9/10 (#199)
adding log statements around archUnit property file
upgrade Gradle to 5.5 and adjust plugin versions
Provide a way to store all current violations of a rule and successively only report new ones
Set log level debug for debug output
Make array type return package name of their component type
Extended domain model in user guide for packages
README: use SVG build status badge
#114: Expose if JavaClass is an array
Reimplement cycle detection using Johnson algorithm.
Implement composite rules, joined via and()
Fixed memory leak in ArchRule.AssertionError in combination with JUnit 4
Issue: #545 Feature Request: Classes that contain annotated methods
Make meta annotated match direct annotations as well
Add library rule to check proxy bypasses
add methods to check for explicitly declared annotation properties
merge release branch 0.16.0 back into master
fix line ending problems in FreezingArchRule
Support to target only Test classes
Add component type to dependencies to self
Add workflow for Update Gradle Wrapper Action.
Add JavaClass type parameters to dependencies
add simple use cases page to ArchUnit website
mention C#/.NET port on homepage, fixing #478
propose fix for #478 (add link to C# version)
Add is annotation to `JavaClass` and fluent API
Add Optional.getOrThrow(Supplier) and replace deprecated method
read empty list of frozen violations correctly
Rules shared between tests have ambiguous names
Run tests against Java 15 during CI
Bump actions/github-script from v1 to v3
Add component type of arrays to JavaClass dependencies #257
Add workflow for Update Gradle Wrapper Action
Don't escape scheme specific part before resolving as URI #414
simplify code that creates class stream
Fix example output for configured JDK in Contributing Guide
Add note about JUnit's `@Disabled` to documentation
GitHub Action to check whether ASM is up-to-date
fix bug where some JDK 7 compiled classes cannot be imported anymore
fix bug where some JDK 7 compiled classes cannot be imported anymore
Enable JUnit support to replace underscores by spaces in test names
upgrade ASM to version 9.2 to add JDK 18 support
onionArchitecture() now keeps ignored dependencies when overriding description
pass annotations of rule fields and methods to JUnit test description
add property `freeze.refreeze` to allow overwriting the current store
Bump actions/github-script from v3 to v4.0.2
correct same package being imported in the user guide example
Bump actions/github-script from v3 to v4.0.1
support primitve array as generic type argument
add fluent API for transitive dependencies
